# Non-Graphitized carbon black (NGCB), N2, 77.4 K, data, t
# K. Nakai et al., DOI:10.1016/j.jcis.2010.08.005
# V(alpha-s=1) = V(P/P0=0.4) = V0.4 = 6.96 [cm3(STP)/g], V(theta=1)=4.34 [cm3(STP)/g], S(BET) = 18.9 [m2/g]
# S(alpha-s)[m2/g] = slope[cm3(STP)/g] * 18.9/6.96 = slope[cm3(STP)/g] * 2.715517
# [pyGASP] BET surface area: a = 19 m2/g, The BET constant is: C = 138, Amount for a monolayer: n = 0.00019 mol/g
#   Amount for a monolayer: n = 0.00019 / (1/1000/22.414) = 0.00019 / 4.461e-5 = 4.25913472 [cm3(STP)/g]
# n/(molecules/nm2) = 0.602 * Gamma/(micro mol/m2)
